text: from my observation haven't done an
aerial survey I would say that about 95%
of the properties would have suffered
some level of damage they would have
lost at least a part of their roofs some
have lost cool roofs some properties
have been totally demolished it is
absolutely heart-wrenching I mean the
infrastructure the utility utilities
infrastructure is damaged the physical
infrastructure was damaged
you'd recognize too that the island is
literally under water and that in itself
represents a serious threat in terms of
mosquito-borne diseases and we have to
be very careful in fact you know that we
are threatened now potentially by yet
another storm hurricane Jose and if that
is the case and it's coming our way
then clearly we will have to evacuate
the residents of Barbuda in fact I am of
the view that as it stands now that
Barbara is barely habitable
you
